night a skeeter -> the : 1

hunter on the -> mountain : 1

mountain a beauregard -> the : 1
a beauregard the -> monster : 1
beauregard the monster -> hunter : 1
monster hunter black -> knight : 1
hunter black knight -> hard : 1
black knight hard -> back : 1
knight hard back -> in : 1
hard back in -> knight : 1
back in knight -> black : 1
in knight black -> knight : 1
knight black knight -> chronicles : 1
black knight chronicles -> omnibus : 1
knight chronicles omnibus -> paint : 1
chronicles omnibus paint -> it : 1
omnibus paint it -> knight : 1
paint it knight -> a : 1
it knight a -> black : 1
knight a black -> knight : 1
a black knight -> short : 3
black knight short -> magic : 1
black knight short -> daddy : 1
black knight short -> unlife : 1

short magic woman -> a : 1
magic woman a -> black : 1
woman a black -> knight : 1

short unlife collected -> black : 1
unlife collected black -> knight : 1
collected black knight -> with : 1
black knight with -> emily : 1
knight with emily -> lavin : 1
with emily lavin -> big : 1
emily lavin big -> an : 1
lavin big an -> anthology : 1
big an anthology -> of : 1
an anthology of -> tales : 1
anthology of tales -> of : 1
of tales of -> alternate : 1
tales of alternate -> return : 1
of alternate return -> to : 1
alternate return to -> eden : 1
return to eden -> book : 1
to eden book -> the : 1
eden book the -> favor : 1
book the favor -> and : 1
the favor and -> other : 1
favor and other -> slices : 1
and other slices -> of : 1
other slices of -> dirt : 1
slices of dirt -> christmas : 1
